NEW ENGLISH TEAS COLLECTION

Make your morning brew a little more magical with the New English Teas collection, inspired by your favourite Disney
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney] characters. Find the perfect set for your tea-loving friends and
family or treat yourself to an extra special afternoon cuppa.


TIMELESS ENGLISH TEA SETS

Pop the kettle on and enjoy a brew prepared using one of the timeless tea sets from the New English Teas range. Mini selections
make the ideal birthday gift [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/gifts/by-occasion/birthday] or festive stocking filler
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/christmas-shop], while a themed bundle is perfect for those tea connoisseurs in your life.

Stunning designs of your favourite Disney characters mean you won't be hiding these tea tins in the cupboard. Place them front and
centre in

metadata.title: New English Teas Collection | English Tea & Tea Sets | Disney Store
metadata.description: Discover the New English Teas collection at Disney Store. Browse the range of timeless illustrated tea tins for when you need to make the perfect brew.

pageContent:
is perfect for those tea connoisseurs in your life.

Stunning designs of your favourite Disney characters mean you won't be hiding these tea tins in the cupboard. Place them front and
centre in the heart of your home to enjoy these caddies and tins for years to come.


WINNIE THE POOH ENGLISH TEA SET

Join Winnie the Pooh and friends [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/disney/movies/winnie-the-pooh-and-friends] for a pot of afternoon
tea – maybe with a dash of honey? – in Hundred Acre Wood. Browse the range of beautifully illustrated tea caddies and tins
inspired by everyone's favourite bear, with your choice of tea bags or loose teas inside.

These Winnie the Pooh teas are vegan and ethically sourced, making them even more of a tempting treat.

Shop the collection today to find the perfect English tea set for your next occasion. Serve in our magical mugs and cups
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/home-and-stationery/home/mugs-cups-and-bottles] with finger sandwiches, cake and a spoonful

pageContent:
AVAILABLE


A POP-ULAR TREAT

The next craveable snack to pop up in this series is an all-time favorite: popcorn! As you can see, Stitch’s love for the fluffy,
buttery snack can get a little out of hand.

[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/lilo-and-stitch]
Background image of A Sweet Sandwich

COMING SOON


A SWEET SANDWICH

What could be better than two Mickey icon cookies with a yummy cream in between? Stitch knows a perfect treat when he attacks it.


THE ULTIMATE COLLECTION HAS CRASH LANDED

This one-of-a-kind 12-part series features snackable spins on your favourite indestructible and completely irresistable alien.
Each launch offers a new Stitch snack soft toy and collectible pin. Here is a look at our featured launches. Check back for more
to be revealed.

metadata.title: Funko POP! | Figures, Collectibles & More | Disney Store
metadata.description: Discover official Funko POP! vinyls of all your Disney, PIXAR, Marvel and Star Wars favourites. Shop the latest Pop! figures, collectibles, accessories and more.

pageContent:
To Top



DISNEY FUNKO POP!

Dive into the world of Funko POP! with official vinyl figures, accessories and collectibles
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/toys-and-fancy-dress/collectibles]. Small and unique with a large-head design, these lovable
figures are the perfect addition to your collection. Relive all your favourite moments from Disney
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney], Marvel [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/marvel]
and Star Wars [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/star-wars] classics and assemble your favourite characters
today.



You’ll find POP! figures from just about any fandom, so you’ll never run out of options! Each POP! vinyl comes fixed in their case
with moulded details inspired by their franchise. Keep them protected, or remove them and start your own magical display.


POP! FIGURES & COLLECTIBLES

Bring the Disney magic home with beloved Funko POP! figures and collectibles. Explore the galaxy with a

metadata.title: Funko POP! | Figures, Collectibles & More | Disney Store
metadata.description: Discover official Funko POP! vinyls of all your Disney, PIXAR, Marvel and Star Wars favourites. Shop the latest Pop! figures, collectibles, accessories and more.

pageContent:
protected, or remove them and start your own magical display.


POP! FIGURES & COLLECTIBLES

Bring the Disney magic home with beloved Funko POP! figures and collectibles. Explore the galaxy with a Han Solo
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/han-solo] vinyl figure, or dance the night away with a
Cinderella [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/cinderella] POP!, complete with a magical
poster backdrop. But don’t stop there! Some POP! figures come in pairs, like the Mickey and Minnie vinyls with monochrome designs
as seen in 1928!

Enjoy limited edition Funko Pop! collectibles of beloved characters with a twist, like the Stitch
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/stitch] Halloween glow-in-the-dark POP! vinyl, or blue
metallic Spider-Man [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/spider-man] figure. Whatever your
fandom, you’re bound to find a collectible

metadata.title: Funko POP! | Figures, Collectibles & More | Disney Store
metadata.description: Discover official Funko POP! vinyls of all your Disney, PIXAR, Marvel and Star Wars favourites. Shop the latest Pop! figures, collectibles, accessories and more.

pageContent:
POP! vinyl, or blue
metallic Spider-Man [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/spider-man] figure. Whatever your
fandom, you’re bound to find a collectible for you!




KEYRINGS & ACCESSORIES

Show your love for Disney on the go with our range of Funko POP! accessories, including keyrings, bags and POP! pins. Find your
favourite characters in mini form to bring with you wherever you go, from a Black Panther
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/black-panther] POP! keychain to an adorable Yoda
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/yoda] POP! pin. Perfect for work, school or exploring
Disney Parks, display your fandom with pride with our collection of POP! accessories.

Bring some magic to your pet’s world with Disney play sets, toys and accessories complete with classic character designs. Take
your pup on an adventure in style with a 101 Dalmatians
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/101-dalmatians] branded lead and collar, or give them a playtime to
remember with a Disney disc toy. Travelling abroad? A Disney-themed travel throw will keep your pet warm and cosy on your journey.
And nothing provides better comfort than an Iron Man [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/marvel/iron-man] chew
toy. Whatever your pet’s needs, our range of Disney accessories and essentials have them

DISNEY SOFT TOYS AND MERCHANDISE

Let your little ones relive the magic of some of Disney’s beloved cats and dogs. Enjoy cuddly soft toys and bean bags including
Lady from the Disney classic, Lady and the Tramp [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/lady-and-the-tramp],
and Mickey Mouse’s faithful companion, Pluto [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/pluto]. Our
Disney soft toys range from small, medium and large – perfect for babies, children and adults alike.


DISNEY PET MERCHANDISE, TUMBLERS AND CUPS

sip from our straw tumbler featuring classic Disney dogs like Dug, Lady, Patch, Max and much

DISNEY ART & COLOURING BOOKS

Let your imagination flow with our magical collection of Disney colouring books. Step into a realm of fantasy with all your
favourite characters across Disney [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney], Pixar
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/pixar], Marvel [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/marvel]
and even Star Wars [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/star-wars]. Our colouring books are the perfect recipe for
relaxation, whether you're at home or on-the-go. Enjoy hours of entertainment as you get creative with different colours and
patterns to bring each character to life.


DISNEY ART KITS

Want to add to your artistic collection? Check out our

metadata.title: Disney Colouring Books & Art Kits | Disney Store
metadata.description: Get creative and discover our range of colouring books, stationery sets, art kits, craft kits & more, starring all of your Disney favourites.

pageContent:
Enjoy hours of entertainment as you get creative with different colours and
patterns to bring each character to life.


DISNEY ART KITS

Want to add to your artistic collection? Check out our collection of Disney art kits filled with colourful pens, paints and
crayons. It's creative fun for the whole family!

Whether you like Marvel superheroes like Spider-Man
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/spider-man], or Disney princesses
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/disney-princess] like Ariel
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/ariel] and Elsa
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/elsa], we’ve got just the thing to inspire the artist
within. Get stuck into your art kit and show off your artistic talents today!

Pair your art kit with our Disney-inspired notebooks and writing

metadata.title: Disney Colouring Books & Art Kits | Disney Store
metadata.description: Get creative and discover our range of colouring books, stationery sets, art kits, craft kits & more, starring all of your Disney favourites.

pageContent:
we’ve got just the thing to inspire the artist
within. Get stuck into your art kit and show off your artistic talents today!

Pair your art kit with our Disney-inspired notebooks and writing sets
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/home-and-stationery/stationery/notebooks-and-writing-sets] – all filled with whimsical designs.
Take notes or create epic tales and watch the magic unfold from the pages.


DISNEY ACTIVITY SETS

Get inspired with activity sets and craft kits dedicated to your all-time Disney favourites. Complete with a selection of
notepads, crayons, pens, stickers, highlighters and more, little ones can have endless fun crafting their own adventures. Choose
from Mickey Mouse [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/mickey-mouse] and Friends or fantastical
Star Wars characters, and let your imagination soar.

Back To Top



DISNEY ART BOOKS & INFOPEDIAS

Experience your favourite Disney [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney], Marvel
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/marvel], Pixar [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/pixar]
and Star Wars [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/star-wars] films like never before with our official collection
of art books and infopedias. Let the magic unfold with our hardback volumes showcasing exclusive artwork, character details and
behind-the-scene sketches of iconic on-screen moments. From Wreck it Ralph
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/wreck-it-ralph] to The Last Jedi, our landmark art books uncover

metadata.title: Disney Books | Art Books & Infopedias | Disney Store
metadata.description: Unlock your imagination with our collection of Disney art books, showcasing iconic moments from your favourite Disney, PIXAR, Marvel and Star Wars films.

pageContent:
sketches of iconic on-screen moments. From Wreck it Ralph
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/wreck-it-ralph] to The Last Jedi, our landmark art books uncover the
visual history that brings all your favourite epic stories to life.


STAR WARS ART BOOKS

Get a glimpse inside the Lucasfilm art departments and find out how the Jedi world came to life with our collection of Star Wars
art books. Each volume focuses on a different film, from Force Awakens to Solo: A Star Wars Story. Flick through and find out how
your favourite characters were created and hear about the process from the creative team themselves.


PIXAR ART BOOKS

Prefer to explore the animated world of Pixar? Whether you love The Incredibles
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/pixar/incredibles] or Onward
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/pixar/onward], our collectible art books provide insights into the creative
process of these iconic animations in stunning

metadata.title: Disney Books | Art Books & Infopedias | Disney Store
metadata.description: Unlock your imagination with our collection of Disney art books, showcasing iconic moments from your favourite Disney, PIXAR, Marvel and Star Wars films.

pageContent:
or Onward
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/pixar/onward], our collectible art books provide insights into the creative
process of these iconic animations in stunning detail. Learn interesting facts and trivia, discover colourful artwork and get lost
in pages of storyboards and colour scripts. Some even include exclusive interviews with the animators and visualists. These
companion art books make the perfect gift for super fans and art enthusiasts alike.

If you want to create some magic of your own, discover our colouring books
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/home-and-stationery/stationery/colouring-and-creativity] range starring your Disney favourites. Or
check out our notebooks and writing sets [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/home-and-stationery/stationery/notebooks-and-writing-sets]
to take notes while you read!

SLEEP TIGHT WITH ADULT DISNEY PYJAMAS

Dream about your favourite characters and movies with Disney pyjamas for adults. You’ll find nightwear for older fans to sleep
comfortably or lounge around the house in. Get some well-deserved rest in a Minnie Mouse
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/minnie-mouse], superhero or princess pyjama set. The world
of Disney isn’t just for the little ones.

Browse our online store for other clothes such as t-shirts and swimsuits for women. You’ll find all your Disney favourites, from
Pluto [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/pluto] and

metadata.title: Adult Disney Pyjamas | Slippers, Nightdress & More | Disney Store
metadata.description: Have the perfect night’s sleep with our collection of adult Disney pyjamas featuring characters from your childhood on slippers, t-shirts and more.

pageContent:
store for other clothes such as t-shirts and swimsuits for women. You’ll find all your Disney favourites, from
Pluto [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/pluto] and Goofy
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/goofy] to characters from Encanto
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/encanto] and Toy Story
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/pixar/toy-story].


MEN’S PYJAMAS AND LOUNGEWEAR

If you’ve always dreamed of being Peter Parker then you’re in luck. We have men’s pyjamas dedicated to the friendly neighbourhood
Spider-Man [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/spider-man] to make bedtime a little more
interesting. Explore our entire collection of Marvel [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/marvel] superheroes and
other favourites from the Star Wars [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/star-wars]

metadata.title: Adult Disney Pyjamas | Slippers, Nightdress & More | Disney Store
metadata.description: Have the perfect night’s sleep with our collection of adult Disney pyjamas featuring characters from your childhood on slippers, t-shirts and more.

pageContent:
collection of Marvel [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/marvel] superheroes and
other favourites from the Star Wars [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/star-wars] universe.


WOMEN’S PYJAMAS AND LOUNGEWEAR

Kick back in our comfortable women’s pyjamas. Lounge in the living room with your favourite Disney film and pair it with a light
and breezy women’s nightdress featuring Bambi [https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/disney/bambi], Eeyore
[https://www.disneystore.co.uk/characters-and-movies/popular-characters/eeyore] and many more. Shop our range of Disney pyjamas
today and relax in style.

metadata.title: Turning Red Mother's Day 2024 Limited Edition Pin | Disney Store
metadata.description: Turning Red Mother's Day 2024 Limited Edition Pin

pageContent:
DETAILS PRODUCT DETAILS PRODUCT DETAILS

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Let your mum know how super she is with a gift of our commemorative cloisonne pin celebrating Mother's Day 2024. Mei Lee and Ming
Lee make a sweet addition to your Disney and Pixar pin collection with this colourful keepsake.

Magic in the details



 * Celebrating Mother's Day 2024
 * Limited to 500 worldwide
 * Classic character artwork
 * 'Happy Mother’s Day' and '2024' wording
 * Enamelled cloisonné
 * Laser print detailing
 * Nickel finish
 * Disney Pin Trading 2024 backstamp
 * Mickey icon pin back
 * Created for Disney Store
 * Exclusive to UK and EU



The bare necessities



 * H5 x W4cm approx.
 * Made from zinc alloy



Item No. 438017624177

DELIVERY DELIVERY DELIVERY

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

pageContent:
MISSION

We want to inspire fans of all ages to live the stories they love through our unique and high-quality toys, clothing, homeware and
more. With every enchanted interaction, we want to provide our Guests with a an unforgettable journey tied to products that make
moments magical.

EXPERIENCES

Transporting guests into the world of Disney at every interaction.


WHAT MAKES US MAGICAL

We connect more Guests to more of the stories they love than anywhere else.
Each and every item is thoughtfully designed and made with the highest quality materials for magic that lasts, providing our
Guests with long lasting memories for the stories they love.
We foster the same sense of wonder and excitement as our Guests for the stories we tell and the Magic we offer.

responsible retailer
within the communities in which we work.


ABOUT OUR WORK

Find our how we work with our charitable partners and our local community.

Background image of Comfort Through Product Giving
[//cdn.s7.shopdisney.eu/is/image/ShopDisneyEMEA/36717_community_page_productgiving_rtt_xtb?fit=constrain&cropN=0,0,1,1&fmt=jpeg&qlt=90&wid=1200]


COMFORT THROUGH PRODUCT GIVING

As part of our commitment to be a responsible business within our community, each year Disney Store donates thousands of products
to local communities across the UK. Working in partnership with In Kind Direct, donated products are redistributed to over 750
charities across the UK, to help enrich the lives of children and their families when they need it most, and ensuring no usable
product goes to waste.

MORE INFORMATION
[https://www.inkinddirect.org]
Background image of Inspiration Through Volunteering


INSPIRATION THROUGH VOLUNTEERING

We believe that for children’s emotional resilience to flourish we

pageContent:
INFORMATION
[https://www.inkinddirect.org]
Background image of Inspiration Through Volunteering


INSPIRATION THROUGH VOLUNTEERING

We believe that for children’s emotional resilience to flourish we need to support the communities to which they belong. The
Disney VoluntEARS Programme gives employees in our Stores, at Head Office and at our Distribution Centre, the opportunity to help
in their local community. In 2018, Disney Store employees across the UK and Europe completed over 19,500 volunteer hours working
on over 400 volunteer events.


WANT TO KNOW MORE?

Learn more about the Walt Disney Company and our Social Purpose.

FIND OUT MORE [https://www.thewaltdisneycompany.eu/social-purpose]
